amendment.description: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to impose a temporary windfall profit tax on crude oil and to rebate the tax collected back to the American consumer, and for other purposes.

action.text: Amendment SA 2587 proposed by Senator Dorgan.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2587.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2587 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 35 - 64. Record Vote Number: 331.
Amendment SA 2587 ruled out of order by the chair.
